maml:description.maml:para: Use Get-PSSubnet cmdlet to get all ip addresses in subnet.

command:example.maml:title: ---------- EXAMPLE 1 ----------
command:example.dev:code:
Get all objects of ip addresses in subnet 10.10.10.0/30. PS> PS C:\Users\mg> Get-PSSubnet -IPList 10.10.10.0/30
IPList ------ {10.10.10.0, 10.10.10.1, 10.10.10.2, 10.10.10.3}

maml:description.maml:para: Use Get-PSSubnetInfo cmdlet to get basic subnet information: network address, broadcast address or netmask info.

command:example.maml:title: ---------- EXAMPLE 1 ----------
command:example.dev:code:
Get information about subnet 10.0.0.0/24. PS> Get-PSSubnetInfo -IPList 10.0.0.0/24
IP : 10.0.0.0 BitMask : 24 NetMask : 255.255.255.0 CIDR : 10.0.0.0/24 NetworkAddress : 10.0.0.0 BroadcastAddress : 10.0.0.255

maml:description.maml:para: Use Get-PSSubnet cmdlet to get active ports on target in subnet.
Use defoult ports for common services.
Protocol type for all scanned ports. Default is Tcp.
Test Ssl protocols. Default use all available.
Test Tls Cipher Suite. Supported on Linux system with OpenSSL 1.1.1 or higher or a macOS.
Use defoult ports for common services.
Protocol type for all scanned ports. Default is Tcp.
Use defoult ports for common services.
Test Tls Cipher Suite. Supported on Linux system with OpenSSL 1.1.1 or higher or a macOS.
Test Ssl protocols. Default use all available.

command:example.maml:title: ---------- EXAMPLE 1 ----------
command:example.dev:code:
Get scan of machine 10.10.1.3. PS> $Scan = Get-PSSubnetScan -IPList 10.10.1.3 -PortList 443,3389 -SSLTest -ICMPTest -RevDNSTest -WSManTest -WMITest PS> $Scan IPAddress Ports ICMP RevDNS WMI WSMan --------- ----- ---- ------ --- ----- 10.10.1.3 3389 True dc01.psmvp.org False True
PS> $Scan[0].Ports Port Active SSLCertificateThumbprint SSLCertificateSubject SSLProtocols ---- ------ ------------------------ --------------------- ------------ 443 False 3389 True D63B270474F61D2EBE621605E302A29892BF7C4B CN= dc01.psmvp.org,... Tls, Tls11, Tls12
PS> $Scan[0].WSMan Active RemotePSVersion WSManUriAuth ------ --------------- ------------ True 5.1.14409.1018 Default, Negotiate, NegotiateWithImplicitCredential, Kerberos

command:example.maml:title: ---------- EXAMPLE 2 ----------
command:example.dev:code: Get scan machines in subnet 10.10.1.0/29. PS> $Scan = Get-PSSubnetScan -IPList 10.10.1.0/29 -PortList 3389 -ICMPTest PS> $Scan IPAddress Ports ICMP RevDNS WMI WSMan --------- ----- ---- ------ --- ----- 10.10.1.0 False 10.10.1.1 False 10.10.1.2 3389 True 10.10.1.3 3389 False 10.10.1.4 3389 True 10.10.1.5 False 10.10.1.6 3389 True 10.10.1.7 False
